questions.question: He is ……………………… generous guy I know.
questions.description: When most is used to make the superlative form of the adjective, it is used with the.

questions.question: ……………………………. children like cartoon shows.
questions.description: When most is used as a determiner, it does not take the.

questions.question: ……………………………….. people are nice to you if you are nice them.
questions.description: When most is used as a determiner, it does not take the.

questions.question: It was ………………………….. enjoyable holiday I ever had.
questions.description: When most is used to make the superlative form of the adjective, it is used with the.

questions.question: ………………………………… of my friends are vegetarians.
questions.description: When most is used as a determiner, it does not take the.

questions.question: ………………………………… people believe in God.
questions.description: When most is used as a determiner, it does not take the.

questions.question: Which country consumes ………………………. meat?
questions.description: When most has a superlative meaning, it is normally used with the.

questions.question: ……………………………. of us want a new government.
questions.description: When most simply means ‘the majority of’, it is not used with ‘the’.

questions.question: …………………………….. of them didn’t go.
questions.description: When most is used as a determiner, it does not take the.

questions.question: …………………………… criminals hail from a poor background.
questions.description: When most is used as a determiner, it does not take the.

questions.question: She wasn’t as beautiful as others, but she was certainly ………………………. intelligent.
questions.description: When most is used to make the superlative form of the adjective, it is used with the.

questions.question: She is ……………………….. suitable candidate for the job.
questions.description: When most is used to make the superlative form of the adjective, it is used with the.
